titles: A true translation of a paper written in French, delivered by Margaret Martell to the under-sheriff at the time and place of her execution, at Suffolk-street end, July 16, 1697, for the barbarous murther of Elizabeth Pullen, wife of Paul Pullen, Esq.
author: Martel, Margaret, d. 1697.
notes: Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
keywords: Women murderers --  England --  Early works to 1800.
